description: This is a React component file implementing the main frontend application for a notes app. It manages notes data, user interactions, and UI layout including a list of notes, a note editor, and related controls, using React hooks and localStorage for persistence.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component for the notes application UI, managing state and interactions.

methods.name: announce
methods.description: Function to update live region for accessibility announcements.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Handles creating a new note, updating state, and announcing the action.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selecting a note by updating selectedId.

methods.name: handleUpdateSelected
methods.description: Handles updating the currently selected note with new data.

methods.name: handleDeleteSelected
methods.description: Handles deleting the currently selected note, with user confirmation and state update.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard shortcuts for note creation and deletion.
